name: Forever Door
description:
A greedy explorer has found his way into a mysterious temple full of strange and mystical creatures.  In order to escape, you must find a valuable item by opening a seemingly endless amount of doors. Will you manage to find the King's crown, or will you die trying? Controls: Mouse-only Backspace to quit microgames and return to Level Select Screen.

Some public domain sound effects and the music for the introductory forest cutscene were used from FreeSounds.org

All other visual assets created in Blender or Paint.net, and most music / sounds created in LMMS.
